pkgmetadata.longdescription: # colcon-mesonA colcon extension for building [Meson](https://mesonbuild.com) packages.Install from the Python Package Index via:```shpip install colcon-meson```## Passing Meson argumentsArguments can be passed to `meson setup` via `--meson-args`:1. set build options defined in `meson_options.txt`: ```sh colcon build --packages-select $PACKAGE --meson-args \ -D$ARG1=$PARAM1 \ -D$ARG2=$PARAM2 ```2. set the build type: ```sh colcon build --packages-select $PACKAGE --meson-args \ --buildtype=debugoptimized ```See `meson setup -h` for a detailed list of arguments.
